001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.chain;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.Quest;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
006import java.util.function.Consumer;
007import org.assertj.core.api.SoftAssertions;
008
009/**
010 * Defines a fluent execution chain for service interactions.
011 *
012 * <p>This interface provides a structured way to perform sequential operations
013 * in a fluent manner, allowing validation and completion of tasks within a
014 * chained execution flow.
015 *
016 * <p>Implementing classes must provide the {@code drop()} method to return a {@code Quest},
017 * enabling further execution and validation within the chain.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public interface FluentChain {
022
023   /**
024    * Retrieves the active {@code Quest} instance for further execution.
025    *
026    * @return The current {@code Quest} instance.
027    */
028   Quest drop();
029
030   /**
031    * Performs a soft validation within the execution chain.
032    *
033    * <p>This validation does not immediately fail the test but collects assertion results
034    * for later evaluation.
035    *
036    * @param assertion The assertion logic to apply.
037    * @return The current {@code FluentChain} instance for method chaining.
038    */
039   default FluentChain validate(Consumer<SoftAssertions> assertion) {
040      Quest quest = drop();
041      LogQuest.validation("Starting soft validation.");
042      assertion.accept(createSuperQuest(quest).getSoftAssertions());
043      return this;
044   }
045
046   /**
047    * Performs a hard validation within the execution chain.
048    *
049    * <p>This validation immediately fails if an assertion does not pass.
050    *
051    * @param assertion The assertion logic to execute.
052    * @return The current {@code FluentChain} instance for method chaining.
053    */
054   default FluentChain validate(Runnable assertion) {
055      LogQuest.validation("Starting hard validation...");
056      try {
057         assertion.run();
058         LogQuest.validation("Hard validation completed successfully.");
059      } catch (AssertionError | Exception e) {
060         LogQuest.validation("Hard validation failed: " + e.getMessage());
061         throw e;
062      }
063      return this;
064   }
065
066   /**
067    * Marks the execution chain as complete.
068    *
069    * <p>This signals that the sequence of operations has been finalized.
070    */
071   default void complete() {
072      drop().complete();
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Wraps the given {@link Quest} in a {@link SuperQuest}, enabling access to
077    * extended functionality such as soft assertions.
078    *
079    * @param quest the base {@code Quest} instance to wrap
080    * @return a new {@code SuperQuest} that decorates the provided quest
081    */
082   default SuperQuest createSuperQuest(Quest quest) {
083      return new SuperQuest(quest);
084   }
085
086}
